title: Baseball bat
data:
| ) [![Baseball bat.png](/images/2/20/Baseball_bat.png)](/wiki/File:Baseball_bat.png) |                                                         |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                | Baseball bat                                            |
| Appearance                                                                          | Baseball bat                                            |
| Damage vs. small                                                                    | 1d8                                                     |
| Damage vs. large                                                                    | 1d6                                                     |
| To-hit bonus                                                                        | +0                                                      |
| Weapon skill                                                                        | club                                                    |
| Size                                                                                | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")             |
| Base price                                                                          | 50 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                              | [40](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                            | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                               |

Baseball bats are a weapon type in [Slash'EM](/wiki/Slash%27EM "Slash'EM") that use the [Club](/wiki/Club "Club") skill and are more powerful than regular clubs. However, they aren't randomly generated, and are generally only seen as the [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") for the [Bat from Hell](/wiki/Bat_from_Hell "Bat from Hell"). You can find a normal one in a [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") level if you already have the [Bat from Hell](/wiki/Bat_from_Hell "Bat from Hell"), or you can even [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for one.

## [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM")

Baseball bats can appear in [junk shops](/index.php?title=Junk_shop\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Junk shop (page does not exist)")

In Hack'EM baseball bats only cost 20zm and can be generated in different materials.

## [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack")

| ) [![Baseball bat.png](/images/2/20/Baseball_bat.png)](/wiki/File:Baseball_bat.png) |                                                         |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                | Baseball bat                                            |
| Appearance                                                                          | Baseball bat                                            |
| Damage vs. small                                                                    | 1d6                                                     |
| Damage vs. large                                                                    | 1d6                                                     |
| To-hit bonus                                                                        | +2                                                      |
| Weapon skill                                                                        | club                                                    |
| Size                                                                                | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")             |
| Base price                                                                          | 50 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                              | [40](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                            | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                               |

In SpliceHack there are a few differences from the standard baseball bat. The damage vs large is d6 instead of d8, they have a +2 to-hit bonus, and they also grant +1AC when wielded.

Baseball bats can appear in [junk shops](/index.php?title=Junk_shop\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Junk shop (page does not exist)"). You can also forge a baseball bat by combining a club with a rubber hose.

SpliceHack added this encyclopedia entry:

The sneer is gone from Casey's lip, his teeth are clenched in hate,  
He pounds with cruel violence his bat upon the plate;  
And now the pitcher holds the ball, and now he lets it go,  
And now the air is shattered by the force of Casey's blow.  
\[ Casey at the Bat, by Ernest Lawrence Thayer ]

## See also

- [Bat from Hell](/wiki/Bat_from_Hell "Bat from Hell")
- [Club](/wiki/Club "Club")
- [torch](/wiki/Torch "Torch")
